meanings.sent1: The broken toy was valueless to the child.
meanings.sent2: The old newspaper was considered valueless by most people.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so valueless that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her promises turned out to be as valueless as a pile of sand.
meanings.sent5: The rusty old key was so valueless that it couldn't even open a single lock.

meanings.sent1: The small argument seemed valueless in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent2: His opinion was often seen as valueless by his peers.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a valueless clue that led him in circles.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work felt as valueless as a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The student's excuse was so valueless that even the teacher couldn't believe it.
